tweets.text: We‚Äôve seen a lot of heavy rainfall across North Yorkshire overnight and have issued a number of Flood Warnings - stay updated with the latest situation by visiting  https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb

I‚Äôm in #cheshire this morning meeting residents who suffered #flooding from the heavy rain. It‚Äôs not just big rivers some of our smaller ones can have devastating impacts too. https://t.co/aPzqMDVwho

As the sun slowly rises, the flood waters across the orchard show how quickly the river Severn has risen in last couple of hours - we are monitoring the @EnvAgency river readings very closely now @GaugeMap #floodaware #riversevern #StaySafe #StormChristophe https://t.co/WTG3FzhV8J

tweets.text:
The Severe #Flood Warning at Dovers Brook in #Maghull has been replaced with a Flood Warning 

Although this is good news, we expect levels to remain high throughout the day, and flooding to properties is still possible

check your flood risk: https://t.co/jOMoAaE4JW

#floodaware https://t.co/NLjZ9ORqK9

These flood alerts remain in place this morning.

Flood warnings could come at some point today, so please continue to keep any eye out here and with @EnvAgencyYNE for updates. https://t.co/5zUWfdQvbv

Graph ‚¨áÔ∏è shows impact of opening of flood gates on Mersey at Sale Ees (for 1st time since early 90s) - huge volume of water pouring into Sale Water Park to prevent Mersey bursting banks. Levels in lake ‚¨ÜÔ∏è 3/4m in 4 hrs - see vid of flood gates from c. same time. üôè @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/wrnsLNuX4f https://t.co/9Z9s7CgfO8

urls.title: Flooding - updates
urls.description: The Amber weather warning across the whole of the county means communities across the Derbyshire Dales need to be on flood alert over the coming days. Particular areas of concern highlighted by the Environment Agency are Bakewell, Baslow and Matlock. As always, the big message is BE PREPARED - see the advice on our website.

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency has placed new #FloodWarning on River Dove at #Doveridge & #Sudbury

12 #Flood Warnings currently in force here in #DerbyshireDales.

See #flood guidance & emergency contact info
üëâ https://t.co/SHUb8P1Yqc https://t.co/DWm1m6C14Y

Our #FieldTeam from @EnvAgencyYNE have today installed some temporary barrier along the #RiverDon in #Doncaster.

This barrier protects an access route to one of the #Covid19 vaccination centres.

It‚Äôs a precautionary measure in case the forecast worsens. https://t.co/IHErO1V8Y8

tweets.text: #Tenbury @EnvAgencyMids keeping a close eye and @WorcsTravel will move the sandbags from the depot to the Swimming Pool car park. #Kempsey extra pump deployed.

Glad I listened to @BBCRadio4 last night & heard advice from @EnvAgency spokesperson on how to prepare for #StormChristophe. Key message 'move your car to higher ground' #Motornormatvity https://t.co/5hYH8tSYj1

urls.title: Flood warnings for England - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text: River levels in Calderdale are still responding to current rainfall and will remain high in the upper parts of the catchment. We continue to monitor the situation . Stay #floodaware and check flood warnings in your area https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb https://t.co/aW7k7fp5PE

With heavy rain forecast, our officers have stepped up patrols, clearing screens and inspecting flood defences. 
Get the latest flood info & sign up to receive flood warnings here: 
https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb https://t.co/tWxRI5w92Y

We have been bolstering the repairs we are currently making to Temple Manor wash lands in the Lower Aire today, as they fill up due to snowmelt and rainfall. Stay #floodaware and check the flood warnings where you live https://t.co/3UGLsuUejh
